title: Woodoo8
author: Woodoo8
content: hello everyone, I connected the 3080lhr to the rig, I use hiveos, I updated the drivers but the board malfunctioned. can someone help me thanks. I have already replaced riser, changed power supply cables etc.

comments.author: BitKongy
comments.body: The only thing that I hold on to is a malfunctioned motherboard, how is the motherboard behaving? What is the reason that prompt you to start changing riser and power supply? Please try to explain the exact behaviour of your motherboard.

comments.author: Woodoo8
comments.body: before I got the 3080 I had about 6 580, having full pci I removed a 580 and I put the 3080 also adding 1 psu to sort the load. he read it and it was fine then I did some oc's and hiveos didn't get stuck. I was advised to update the drivers to make it make more (before 83mh) updated drivers and exit malfunction

comments.author: Woodoo8
comments.body: I tried to put it under another rig and it works it seems like the new 510 drivers

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: It's a little hard to understand your problemYou have a rig with 6 RX 580, you tried to remove 1 and put a 3080lhr, after that the rig stopped?It doesn't turn on? Only the 3080 is not working?Other cards are working and mining?If you give more details, it will be easy to try to help youI suggest you to install a fresh new HiveOS, with all the cards together, maybe you're using only AMDs and somehow drivers crashed or didn't installed properlyIf you already checked riser and psu cables, try to change the position of card too

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Woodoo8 on May 31, 2022, 07:54:33 AMhello everyone, I connected the 3080lhr to the rig, I use hiveos, I updated the drivers but the board malfunctioned. can someone help me thanks. I have already replaced riser, changed power supply cables etc.If your motherboard is broken, then why are you changing the raiser and power cable?I first disconnect all video cards, check the processor socket, install a test video card, such as a GT 220, and test the motherboard on a tested power supply.

comments.author: Woodoo8
comments.body: I had updated the nvidia drivers, they are the ones that crashed the 3080 so I went back to the old one and it works. what drivers do you recommend me to use?

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Quote from: Woodoo8 on June 01, 2022, 05:33:48 PMI had updated the nvidia drivers, they are the ones that crashed the 3080 so I went back to the old one and it works. what drivers do you recommend me to use?So, the problem was the drivers...If you update to the latest version of Nvidia drivers on HiveOS you are probably running a version with LHR locked againI think N 510.68.02 is the driver to install if you want to unlock LHRYou can read here how to deal with driver updates and get an older version: https://hiveon.com/knowledge-base/guides/nvidia_dr/To summarize, you can use nvidia-driver-update --list and choose the version you want

comments.author: Woodoo8
comments.body: I tried the 510 but from problems as I said I went back to the 470.86 to make it work at least at 84mh which sometimes crashes and I have to reset. which drivers do you recommend? or am I going to attempts?

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Quote from: Woodoo8 on June 01, 2022, 08:08:34 PMI tried the 510 but from problems as I said I went back to the 470.86 to make it work at least at 84mh which sometimes crashes and I have to reset. which drivers do you recommend? or am I going to attempts?If you have problems with 510.68.02 you can go up to 510.73.05, or go by trial and error.As I said to you, try to reinstall HiveOS from scratch, if you are using SSD or HDD, you can install on a flash drive just to testEven with 470.86 you are getting crashes, so it's not driver version, I suspect you have some conflict issues, doing again from zero is my best hint

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Woodoo8 on June 01, 2022, 05:33:48 PMI had updated the nvidia drivers, they are the ones that crashed the 3080 so I went back to the old one and it works. what drivers do you recommend me to use?Use the drivers recommended by the miner developer. Perhaps you have other errors that occurred when installing new drivers. Before installing new drivers, use Display Driver Uninstaller DDU to remove old drivers.
